entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
